longBusinessSummary: Novartis India Limited operates as a healthcare company in India. The company offers therapeutic products in the areas of bone and pain products under the Voveran brand; transplantation immunology products under the Simulect, Certican, Sandimmun, Neoral, and Myfortic brands. It also offers neurosciences products under the Tegrital and Exelon brands. Novartis India Limited was incorporated in 1947 and is based in Mumbai, India. The company is a subsidiary of Novartis AG.
